languages.text: "Когда Голодные уходили, мы обменялись дарами — рунами стаи. Каждую десятую вахту жрец бросал руны и читал в них судьбу. Через пятьдесят вахт после ухода Голодных руны показали Невзгоду. Через шестьдесят — Смерть. С тех пор они стали безгласы, а их расклады лишены смысла".

"When the Baleful Howl was setting off, we exchanged gifts — our pack runes. Every tenth watch, a priest cast the runes and saw what fate they revealed. Fifty watches after the Baleful Howl left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."
languages.original_text: "Когда Голодные уходили, мы обменялись дарами — рунами стаи. Каждую десятую вахту жрец бросал руны и читал в них судьбу. Через пятьдесят вахт после ухода Голодных руны показали Невзгоду. Через шестьдесят — Смерть. С тех пор они стали безгласы, а их расклады лишены смысла".

traits.locale_text: "When the Famehungry were setting off, we exchanged gifts — our pack runes. Every tenth watch, a priest cast the runes and saw what fate they revealed. Fifty watches after the Famehungry left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

Fifty watches after the Famehungry left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."

Fifty watches after the Baleful Howl left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: “当怒嚎者出发的时候，两支狼群交换了他们的符文作为临别赠礼。每隔十巡，我们的符文牧师就会催动符文的力量，看看符文揭示了怎样的命运。怒嚎者离开了五十巡之后，符文预示着灾难，而当他们离开六十巡之后，符文揭示了死亡。在那之后，符文就不再有任何反应，上面的图案也不再有任何意义。”
languages.original_text: "When the Baleful Howl was setting off, we exchanged gifts — our pack runes. Every tenth watch, a priest cast the runes and saw what fate they revealed. Fifty watches after the Baleful Howl left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."

traits.locale_text: “当渴名者出发的时候，两支狼群交换了他们的符文作为临别赠礼。每隔十巡，我们的符文牧师就会催动符文的力量，看看符文揭示了怎样的命运。渴名者离开了五十巡之后，符文预示着灾难，而当他们离开六十巡之后，符文揭示了死亡。在那之后，符文就不再有任何反应，上面的图案也不再有任何意义。”
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: 「破滅の咆哮が出発するというときに、あいつらとプレゼント交換をしたのさ…俺たちの群れのルーンをな。偵察10回毎に、司祭はルーンを読み取って運命を啓示する。破滅の咆哮と別れてから50回目の偵察でルーンは厄災を示した。60回目で…死が見えた。それ以来ルーンは応えない、あいつらのやり方は何の意味もなかったってわけさ」
languages.original_text: "When the Baleful Howl was setting off, we exchanged gifts — our pack runes. Every tenth watch, a priest cast the runes and saw what fate they revealed. Fifty watches after the Baleful Howl left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."

traits.locale_text: 「誉れある飢えが出発するというときに、あいつらとプレゼント交換をしたのさ――俺たちの群れのルーンをな。偵察10回毎に、司祭はルーンを読み取って運命を啓示する。誉れある飢えと別れてから50回目の偵察でルーンは厄災を示した。60回目で…死が見えた。それ以来ルーンは応えない、あいつらのやり方は何の意味もなかったってわけさ」
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: «Cuando el Aullido Torvo partía, intercambiábamos nuestras runas de jauría a modo de regalos. Cada diez guardias, un sacerdote contemplaba las tunas y veía el destino que entrañaban. Cincuenta guardias después de que se marchara el Aullido Torvo, las runas auspiciaron una calamidad. A las sesenta guardias, la muerte. Desde entonces, dejaron de emitir presagios y sus patrones no tienen sentido alguno».
languages.original_text: "When the Baleful Howl was setting off, we exchanged gifts — our pack runes. Every tenth watch, a priest cast the runes and saw what fate they revealed. Fifty watches after the Baleful Howl left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los Hambrientos de Fama partían, intercambiábamos nuestras runas de manada a modo de regalos. Cada diez guardias, un sacerdote contemplaba las tunas y veía el destino que entrañaban. Cincuenta guardias después de que se marcharan los Hambrientos de Fama, las runas auspiciaron una calamidad. A las sesenta guardias, la muerte. Desde entonces, dejaron de emitir presagios y sus patrones no tienen sentido alguno».
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: « Les Hurleurs sanguinaires et nous avons échangé des présents – nos runes de meutes – avant de leur départ. Toutes les dix veilles, un prêtre consultait les runes pour s'assurer de leur sort. Cinquante veilles après le départ des Hurleurs, les runes ont annoncé une catastrophe puis, dix veilles plus tard, la mort. Les runes sont depuis muettes et leurs tirages, dénués de signification. »
languages.original_text: "When the Baleful Howl was setting off, we exchanged gifts — our pack runes. Every tenth watch, a priest cast the runes and saw what fate they revealed. Fifty watches after the Baleful Howl left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."

traits.locale_text: « Les Dévoreurs de gloire et nous avons échangé des présents – nos runes de meutes – avant de leur départ. Toutes les dix veilles, un prêtre consultait les runes pour s'assurer de leur sort. Cinquante veilles après le départ des Dévoreurs, les runes ont annoncé une catastrophe puis, dix veilles plus tard, la mort. Les runes sont depuis muettes et leurs tirages, dénués de signification. »
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Als die Baleful Howl aufbrachen, tauschten wir Geschenke aus — unsere Rudelrunen. Jede zehnte Wache deutete ein Priester die Runen, um zu sehen, welches Schicksal sie offenbarten. Fünfzig Wachen nach der Abreise der Baleful Howl zeigten die Runen Unheil. Sechzig Wachen nach ihrer Abreise — den Tod. Seitdem sind die Runen ohne Stimme und ihre Muster ohne Bedeutung."
languages.original_text: "When the Baleful Howl was setting off, we exchanged gifts — our pack runes. Every tenth watch, a priest cast the runes and saw what fate they revealed. Fifty watches after the Baleful Howl left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."

traits.locale_text: "Als die Famehungry aufbrachen, tauschten wir Geschenke aus – unsere Rudelrunen. Bei jeder zehnten Wache warf ein Priester die Runen und sah das Schicksal, das sie enthüllten. Fünfzig Wachen nach dem Aufbruch der Famehungry zeigten die Runen Bedrängnis. Nach sechzig Wachen war es ... Tod. Seitdem sind die Runen verstummt, ihr Muster hat keine Bedeutung mehr."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: "Uğursuz Uluma yola çıkarken birbirimize sürü rünlerimiziden hediye ettik. Rahipler, her on nöbette bir rünleri okur ve yazılan kaderleri görür. Uğursuz Uluma yola çıktıktan elli nöbet sonra rünler Felaket gösterdi. Altmış nöbet sonra Ölüm gösterdi. O zamandan beri rünlerden ses çıkmadı, desenleri de anlamını yitirdi."
languages.original_text: "When the Baleful Howl was setting off, we exchanged gifts — our pack runes. Every tenth watch, a priest cast the runes and saw what fate they revealed. Fifty watches after the Baleful Howl left, the runes showed Calamity. Sixty watches after they left — Death. Since then, the runes have been voiceless and their patterns hold no meaning."

traits.locale_text: "Uğursuz Uluma yola çıkarken birbirimize sürülerimizin rünlerinden hediye ettik. Her on nöbette bir rahip rünleri okur ve yazılan kaderleri görür. Uğursuz Uluma yola çıktıktan elli nöbet sonra rünler Felaket gösterdi. Altmış nöbet sonra Ölüm gösterdi. O zamandan beri rünlerden ses çıkmadı ve desenleri anlamını kaybetti."
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC
